title: Corporate Learning Module Workflow
description: This interactive flowchart demonstrates how to design time-efficient corporate training MicroSims. The workflow shows the complete learner journey through a typical 12-15 minute module, from launch to completion, with timing annotations at each step.
subject: Mathematics
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of corporate learning module workflow
Apply corporate learning module workflow to solve problems
Visualize and interpret corporate learning module workflow relationships
Test understanding of corporate learning module workflow through interactive exercises
